events.name: Lithium Analysis
events.wd_description: Lithium scores high in demand growth, concentration of reserves, concentration of production, and primary material use, driven by fast development of EVs and concentrated reserves in Chile and production in Australia.

events.name: High Criticality Scores for Lithium
events.description: Lithium dominates the criticality scores in demand growth, concentration of reserves, concentration of production, and primary material use.
